  • Old Search and the Strangers

    by Major A. F. Grant

    $4.99

    Old Search is up against his most dangerous foe ... the Thugs of Gotham and their ruthless use of the strangler's cord! What dark plot leads to kidnapping and murder?

  • Back from the Dead

    by Old Ironnerve, Jr.

    $4.99

    When master detective, Foster King, is called in to investigate peculiar events at the Central-Midland Bank, he finds more than simple embezzlement, he finds a mind capable of controlling others and forcing them to do his bidding. Can Old Ironnerve outwit this mysterious hypnotist and bring a murderer to justice?

  • The Whispering Eye

    by G. T. Fleming-Roberts

    $3.99

    Hunted by the police ... framed for robbery and murder by the Eye, master fiend and vicious ruler of the underworld ... loathed by Barbara Sutton the girl who loves him ... the BLACK HOOD had to face the blazing purgatory of this murder master's guns to win back Barbara's love and clear himself of the framed charges.

    by Marthé Neville

    $2.99

    Willoughby is jealous of his wife's relationship with the new gardener. But who is the mysterious man and how does a faithful wife's relationship with him lead to murder?

  • Bereave It, Or Not

    by Thorne Lee

    $2.99

    The most thankless task of Detective Daventry's career was the case of the mystified murderer. For because his victim was unknown and unmourned, the only gratitude due to Daventry would be a pat on the back from the Grim Reaper.

  • Black Shadows

    by J. C. Kofoed

    $2.99

    When old man Guerney is found murdered in his locked study, then the prime suspect and a mysterious tattooed man are also found murdered, newspaperman Johnny Suggs is determined to prove Mildred Guerney's innocense and prove himself to his father.

  • Blueberry Pie

    by Thyra Samter Winslow

    $2.99

    The story about the execution of Stuart Dennison shook Irma as she recalled her old life back in New York. Before she was Irma Martin. When she was Mrs. Stuart Dennison.

  • The Abandoned House

    by Buelah Poynter

    $2.99

    Trying to escape the storm, Alan and his sister, Nell, seek shelter in the old abandoned house. But when they discover Judge MacPherson recently murdered, will they find the killer or death?

  • Butterfly of Death

    by John H. Knox

    $2.99

    A queer kind of a chuckle hit my eardrum. “You’re Joe Delaney,” repeated the voice, and then it added, “So you think you can take my little Butterfly away from me and nothing will happen to you?”
